meta.name: World's Deadliest Weather: Caught on Camera
meta.description: Footage capturing the destruction and chaos caused by severe weather conditions, featuring first-hand accounts from those who have survived such events.

videos.title: Spain Floods
videos.overview: The worst flood in modern history devastates Valencia. In the U.S., the third-largest wildfire in Oregon rages for 39 days as multiple blazes burn nearly half a million acres.

videos.title: Italy Floods
videos.overview: The region of Emilia-Romagna in Northern Italy is hit by devastating floods after six months' worth of rain falls in just 36 hours, engulfing nearby cities and towns.
